messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a pack of mice have stampeded into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a pack of wire eating mammals have migrated into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Paperwork Mishap Alert

A recent bureaucratic error in the Organic Resources Department may result in personnel shortages in some departments and redundant staffing in others.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed human level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, a whoop of wire eating mammals have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mech Bay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a swarm of rodents have descended into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.
